packages.title: Social Media Starter Pack
packages.shortDesc: Best for small businesses wanting basic visibility on social media.
packages.fullDesc: This plan includes essential social media setup, basic content posting, brand styling, and simple engagement growth strategies. Perfect for new businesses entering social platforms.

packages.title: Growth & Engagement Package
packages.shortDesc: Grow your brand with targeted content and engagement strategies.
packages.fullDesc: A full-service social marketing strategy including regular content, ads setup, branding consistency, analytics, audience segmentation, and engagement boosts.

packages.title: Advanced Social Automation
packages.shortDesc: Complete social media management + automation + influencer strategy.
packages.fullDesc: Ideal for advanced brands wanting large-scale social presence, automated posting, lead generation, influencer partnerships, and weekly analytics with advanced reporting.
